root: ^If they are not in a hurry, they should give way to people who do, instead of wandering in the middle of the sidewalk.
^"The train is... only minutes to go. See if I can make it."
^*the platform and the railway are both lifted above the streets. Once through the ticket gate, one has to walk up a stair to the platform.*
^*the train is, again, crowded and stuffed, "like a can of sardines". it is waiting right there on the platform; you have to be hurry enough to barely fail to catch it.*
